description:
Hello and welcome to Modern Facebook Marketing: The Top 12 in Page Post Content.  In this course, we'll learn exactly how to engage our facebook audience and keep them engaged.  Together, we will look at the several different ways you can notify your facebook universe.  

What We'll Do

  • Learn how to engage in open dialogue
  • Learn how to engage our audience without the use of content
  • Learn how to engage our audience with the use of the Top 12 in Page Post Content
    • Humor, Education, Stories & More
  • Learn the most optimal times to make a post
  • Learn what makes a post effective

This course was designed for anyone looking to garner more attention or looking to engage an audience.  After taking this course, you will have a better understanding for all of the different types of post content that you can utilize.  Through the use of screenshots I gathered, we'll take a in depth look at how other popular pages utilized content to their benefit.  Finally, we'll pull everything together that we learned in the course with some helpful quick tips.
title: Modern Facebook Marketing: The Top 12 in Page Post Content
